text: Don t want to die but want to be deadI suspect a lot of people feel similarly to the way I do when it comes to death  For quite some time I ve felt like I wish I was dead  No longer here  But I didn t particularly feel like committing suicide  I didn t want to be the one to end it  the one to cause immense pain to my family  to have it become some mess for others to clean up and remember me by some embarrassing  selfish  tragic  depressing way  I just wish I could die in my sleep  have a heart attack  embolism  something quick  largely painless  and most importantly not my fault   I suspect though that s unlikely  Things in my life seem to get worse by the day  Bad decision here  unlucky there  I wonder if many who feel the way I do may also eventually lead down this path  the path where the want to be dead becomes so familiar and heavy that you finally do take an action that realizes your aspiration  for lack of a better term  I m getting there
summary: I don't want to die. I just want to be dead. I wonder if many people feel the same way. I suspect though that it's unlikely as things in my life seem to get worse by the day and I'm getting there.
